main.slogan_after_different: custom ROM for your Meizu M6 note.

opensource.title: Open-Source
opensource.description: MeizuSucks kernel is fully open source and you can freely explore its code by visiting GitHub and make sure that there are no backdoors in ROM. LineageOS is open source too. MeizuSucks kernel provides you the latest security patches, optimized drivers and so on.

better_photos.title: Better photos
better_photos.description: MeizuSucks ROM provides you open source camera HAL, which allows you to use RAW, Camera2API and of course Google Camera! Your camera gets a second life.

new_android.title: New Android version
new_android.description: MeizuSucks provides you fresh Android version with brand new drivers and security patches. OS is running smooth and you get much more performance in games and programms.

bootloader.title: Unlock bootloader
bootloader.description: Unlock your bootloader by following guides from 4PDA or XDA. These steps are common for all M6 Note ROMs.

orangefox.title: Install OrangeFox
orangefox.description: Install OrangeFox recovery with modern UI which provides you advanced features in comparsion with official TWRP.

modem.title: Install Flyme 8 modem
modem.description: To avoid some unexpected bugs, you need to install Flyme 8 modem and some other firmwares from it. All of them located in this patch:

install.title: Install MeizuSucks!
install.description: Download MeizuSucks from download link, wipe data, cache, dalvik-cache and system, then flash MeizuSucks!
install.note: Note: install BitGAPPS/NikGAPPS after MeizuSucks if you need. Warning. Installation of Magisk forbid you to send bug reports and get help from developers.

report.title: Report a bug
report.addons_note: (which GAPPS have you installed and any other patches)
